import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faChevronUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './TreeItem.scss' const TreeItem = ({ item, index, checked, setChecked, children }) => { const [collapsed, setCollapsed] = useState(false) const toggleCollapse = () => setCollapsed((val) => !val) const renderChildren = () => children.map(c => (
Item {item.name}
{ children.map()}
)) return (
Item {item.name}
{ checked && renderChildren() }
) } export default TreeItem
